DataElement.preferredName: Recent Patient Periapical Radiography Yes or No Response
DataElement.preferredDefinition: Near to or not long before the present. A person who receives medical attention, care, or treatment, or who is registered with medical professional or institution with the purpose to receive medical care when necessary. At or around the apex of the root of a tooth. A radiographic procedure using the emission of x-rays to form an image of the structure penetrated by the radiation. A caDSR representation term that is used to indicate a question with permissible values of yes/no

ReferenceDocuments.name: Is there a periapical x-ray a
ReferenceDocuments.description: Is there a periapical x-ray available that was taken within the past 6 months or will an x-ray be taken today?
